info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 8:41PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Rutherford and northeastern Polk Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 841 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles west of Rutherfordton, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rutherfordton, Forest City, Spindale, Shingle Hollow, Green Hill, Thermal City, Union Mills, Mill Spring and Harris. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
